scripts.copy:files: npm run copy:license && npm run copy:readme
scripts.build:lib:watch: cd ./projects/junte-ui/ && gulp iconfont && ng build junte-ui --watch
scripts.build:lib: cd ./projects/junte-ui/ && gulp iconfont && ng build junte-ui
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:lib && rm -rf dist/junte-ui/lib/assets && cd ./projects/junte-ui && gulp iconfont && cd ../../ && mkdir ./dist/junte-ui/lib/assets && mkdir ./dist/junte-ui/lib/assets/images && mkdir ./dist/junte-ui/lib/assets/fonts && mkdir ./dist/junte-ui/lib/assets/styles && cp -r ./projects/junte-ui/src/lib/assets/images/icons ./dist/junte-ui/lib/assets/images/icons/ && cp -r ./projects/junte-ui/src/lib/assets/fonts/icons ./dist/junte-ui/lib/assets/fonts/icons && cp ./projects/junte-ui/src/lib/assets/styles/icons.scss ./dist/junte-ui/lib/assets/styles/ && cp ./projects/junte-ui/src/lib/assets/styles/_variables.scss ./dist/junte-ui/lib/assets/styles/ && cp ./projects/junte-ui/src/lib/assets/styles/common.scss ./dist/junte-ui/lib/assets/styles/
scripts.package: npm run build:prod && npm run copy:files && npm run npm:pack
